data.text: Inlet-ah Jisu'n Galilee tuidiil khamma minchuna aleiphut. Ama koolla hong-inchun mipui ngaikha inleitam, khawa jarra ama'n rakuong inkhat suungnga aluut-ah alei in-ong. Rakuong kha tuikhamma aleiom, khale inruoiya mipui ngai-um tuikham khan inleingir. Luk 5:1-3
Ama'n chongminkhi katamtak aneimanna inmani ngaikha aleiminchu, halli inmani diang aleiti:
“Rangairu! miring inkhat in muchiru kaworsik aheisuokjei.
Ama'n leiya muchiru kha aheiwor pha, lekkhat in lamkoolla achul, halli wa ngai'n inheiwa-ah inruut.
Muchiru lekkhat in neipil toomna lungbil khan inchul. Muchiru kha innot-ah ahongmoong, ajarchu neipil kha lei-inthuukmak.
Halli kani ahongsuok pha, akadoong muchichiak ngaikha injuo charjei; ajarchu inrajung kha inthuuk-ah leisi matormak, muchichiak ngaikha innot-ah inleichar.
Muchiru lekkhat in raling karra inchul, inhongmoong takkha raling in aleidiip, halli inmani leikaramu.
Takkha muchiru lekkhatchu neipil hoina-ah inleichul, khat-um achiakngai khan inhongkek, inhong-insoon, khat-um inhongkara: lekkhat in soomthum, soomruk halli lekkhat in rajakhat inhongkara.”
Halli Jisu'n ahekna-ah aleiti, “Akuor indou rakip in hiwahi rangairu!”
Jisu'n atheinuoa aompha, ama siamruoi soomleini ngaile inruoiya ama jarra kajet ngai'n akoolla inheiwa halli chongminkhi ngaikha incheenna rilcheen nasik amadiang inleirakel.
“Nangni diangchu Pathian Rengram jarra inthup rakip jetnasik kha anapejei,” tia Jisu'n aleimasang. “Takkha tu ka-ang tuolla kaom lekkhat ngaisikchu, chongminkhi hinna hiwa rakip ngaihi injetsik eii,
Khawa jarra,
Halli Jisu'n inmani diang aleirakel, “Nangni'n hiwa chongminkhi hi jetmakchube? Kha e-inle, nangni'n chongminkhi rakip ngaihi angtho tholi ningjet sikme?
Muchi kaworpa khan Pathian chongkha awor.
Miring lekkhat khachu lamsirra kachul muchi ngaikhale in-ang; inmani'n khawa chongkha injetli injetmak, Seitan khan aheiwali achoideljei.
Miring lekkhat ngai'n lungkarra akata muchi khale in-ang. Inmani'n khawa chongkha injetli injetmak, karok tak-ah inleikeiluut.
Takkha inmani inrajung inthuuk-ah leisimu, khat-um inmani soot leideimatormu. Khawa chongkhan ajar-eya, poongraalna aheiwapha khanchu, inmani'n innot-ah mangna innei.
Miring lekkhat ngaikhan raling karra kachul muchi khale in-ang. Inmani ngaihi chong kajetjei ngaikha in-eii,
Takkha hiwa ringkhuo poongna ngai, inchong kamanuom, khat-um aleiilaak manuomna rakip ngaikhan, khawa chongkha inminmang, khawa jarra inmani karamu.
Takkha miring lekkhat khachu neipil hoina munna inwor muchi khale in-ang. Inmani'n chongkha inrangai, inkeiluut, lekkhat in soomthum, soomruk, halli lekkhat in rajakhat inkara.”
Jisu'n aminchudel nook-ah, “Tu inkhat innum meiser heichoiya halli kok nuoiya emakli zaalmun nuoiya inda ngaiyabe? meiser kechungnga inda-ngai emak abe?
Lei inthup ngaikha lahong inlarsik eii, halli lei inkhu rakip ngaikha ala inlongsik eii.
Akuor indou rakip in hiwahi rangairu!”
Ama'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni'n ningjet ngaikhan insingtheiru. Nangni'n mi ngai chungnga chong ningtan angnga nangni diang-um Pathian in atansik eii, kheella atansik eii. Matt 7:2; Luk 6:38
Ajarchu akanei amadiang kheella apesik eii, han kaneimak amadiang ama inei lekteii kha-um aleidelsik eii.” Matt 13:12; 25:29; Luk 19:26
Jisu'n aleiril, “Pathian Rengram khachu, miring inkhat in aleiya muchiru iwor khale in-ang.
Ama'n zaanna azaal, suun eli inthei, halli khawa rathil muchiru ngaikhan inhongkek-ah inhongmoong. Hiwahi angtho tholi kasuokme iti ama'n leijetmak.
Neipil khan muchi chiak ngaikha minmoong halli inhongkara; mansakhet-ah inziik inhongsuok, halli inbor, ahekna-ah sawuui katha kha inkara.
Sawuui kha aminpha, mipa khan kooiteiiya saang karakhool aleiphut, ajarchu leirakhool phakha aheitungjei. Jo 3:13
“Pathian Rengram hi angleme in-ang nitisik?” Jisu'n aleirakel. “Angkachang chongminkhi nineimanli nirilcheen sikme?
Khawa khachu, miring inkhat in manmasituolla, akasinkhet anchamru achoiya, neipilla iwor khale in-ang.
Apha lekkhat eli ahongmoong khat-um thingkuung ngai karra akalokkhet ahong eii. Khat-um abaak kalok ngai ahongsuok ah khawa ralikhan wa ngai'n inrabu inleiphan.”
Jisu'n ama chongkha mi ngaidiang aleiril, hiwa ka-ang chongminkhi katamtak ngaihi aneimanna; ama'n inmani diang injetmatorseng aleirilpi.
Ama'n chongminkhi inchellekleiya inmani diang iteii inkhat-um leirilpimak, takkha ama asiamruoi ngaile inom phakhan, ama'n incheenna angrakip ngaikha inmani diang aleirilpi.
Khawa nitak kholeitiang khan Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Eini tuidiil raalkhattiang khan rakaan inlang sirui.”
Khawa jarra inmani'n mipui ngaikha inda-ah; asiamruoi ngai'n Jisu alei in-ongna rakuong khan inluut-ah, inmani'n ama kha inleiruoi. Rakuong lekkhat-um khawa munkhan inleiom.

Jetlei theileiya thipui kangar inkhat ahongraangnga, tuiphuksaan khan rakuong pangkha hongzeemma tuikaluut aleiphut, rakuong kha tui'n hongsipsik aleitho. Thipui ka-ngar khat-um tuiphuksaan khan rakuong pangkha ihongzeem
Jisu'n rakuong nuktiang khan, luthun aneiya aleizaal. Asiamruoi ngai'n ama inkeitheiya inleiti, “Karu, keini kathisik kin-ejei, keini sik-ah nang ngaidon makchebe?”
Jisu'n angirra thipui diangkhan chong aleipeii, “Omchianro!” halli ama'n tuiphuksaan diangkhan aleiti, “Daitaro!” Thipui kha ajuodai, halli khawakhan thipuikha ajuodaijei.
Halli Jisu'n asiamruoi ngaidiang aleiti, “Angsik-ah nangni'n ningchime? Tuunkatung nangni ngamna laneimak chube?”
Takkha kachi khan inmani diang asip-ah inkhatli inkhat diang inlei-inti, “Hiwa miring hi tume? thipui khat-um tuiphuksaan innum achong injuihi!”
